text: Abakaboni na ukuba zingaphi izizukulwana eSazitshabalalisayo phambi kwabo eSazimiselayo emhlabeni, ngohlobo eSingazanga Sinimisele ngalo nina? Sathulula phezu kwabo imvula esibhakabhakeni ngobuninzi bayo, Saphuphumisa imilambo phantsi kwabo. Kodwa Sabatshabalalisa ngenxa yezono zabo, Saza Sadala ezinye izizukulwana emva kwabo
